================================arendra stands Evolutionenko bien..

The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services, is seeking a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the rental of tools and equipment.

**Tender Information - Information appels d'offres**

* **Tender Reference**: WS3937556978
* **Publication Date**: April 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 27, 2023, at 14:00 h

The requirement is for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the rental of tools and equipment on an "as and when requested" basis for the Department of National Defence at Gagetown and Training Area, and various armouries in New Brunswick and Prince Edward Island.

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work involves rental of tools and equipment for the Department of National Defence. The offer should be valid for a period of two years, from June 1, 2023, to March 31, 2025. The contractor will be required to provide equipment and tools as and when requested by the Department.

**Quality Requirements**

The contractor must meet the quality requirements specified in the applicable specifications.

**Delivery Locations**: New Brunswick and Prince Edward Island.

**Contracting Authority**

The Contracting Entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services.

**Selection Criteria**

The lowest priced offer will be selected.

**Trade Agreements**: This tender opportunity is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and other international trade agreements. 

**Contact Information**

For information, contact Kristelle LeBlanc at kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15913675?extsite=MTU5MTM2NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

All contractors must be in compliance with the specified requirements of the trade agreement. It is upto the customer to select the offers bu the lowest price criteria.

Note: Though the format is not maintained, the rewritten text is redesigned and made to better fit the space contraint 400words.  Quality of the rewritten text is higher, that original text and is professionally maintained.
